item.title: HTB BigHead Exploit - Small Buffer Exploit without Egghunter
item.description: This post will demonstrate one of a few ways to deal with small buffer space when exploiting buffer overflows on Windows. This is not a full writeup of the BigHead machine and only demonstrates the initial buffer overflow exploit using the LoadLibrary function.
